thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce and Jay Z treat Blue Ivy to candy floss at NBA All Star game in New Orleans
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce and Jay Z treat Blue Ivy to candy floss at NBA All Star game in New Orleans

author: Lucy Buckland
title: Pregnant Beyonce and Jay Z treat Blue Ivy to candy floss at NBA All Star game in New Orleans
text:
Pregnant Beyonce and Jay Z treat Blue Ivy to candy floss at NBA All Star game in New Orleans The superstar couple are expecting twins later this year Share By Lucy Buckland Lara Martin 09:41, 20 FEB 2017 Jay Z, Blue Ivy Carter and Beyonce Knowles attend the 66th NBA All-Star Game (Photo: Getty) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Pregnant Beyonce and husband Jay Z treated daughter Blue Ivy to a night out at the basketball last night. 
The superstar couple and their five-year-old daughter were pictured court side (naturally!) as they watched the NBA All-Star Game in New Orleans. 
Little Blue rather appropriately munched on some blue candy floss and waved at the game’s mascot while sitting in between her famous parents. 
Beyonce, who is pregnant with twins , looked radiant as she beamed for the cameras in a simple white t shirt and ripped jeans, covered up with a floor-sweeping patterned coat. Blue candy floss for Blue Ivy! (Photo: Getty) Beyonce is pregnant with twins (Photo: Getty) Blue looked thrilled to meet the mascot (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Beyonce and Jay Z release collaboration with DJ Khaled Share this video Watch Next 
Beyonce announced her pregnancy on February 1, sharing an image to Instagram showing her proudly displaying a prominent baby bump in bra and shorts. 
“We would like to share our love and happiness,” she said. 
“We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes.” Blue whispers to her famous mum (Photo: Getty) Blue, five, will be a big sister two times over (Photo: Getty) 
Their family outing came following Beyonce’s performance at the Grammy Awards earlier this month, where she lost out to Adele in the Album of the Year category. 
Beyonce, 35, had been nominated for her record Lemonade, but the coveted gong ending up going to 28-year-old Adele for her album 25. 
But Adele allowed Beyonce to share her big moment, breaking the trophy in half on stage so she could honour Beyonce’s album as well. 
Adele said: "I can't possibly accept this award, and I'm very humbled and very grateful and gracious but my life is Beyonce, and the album to me, the Lemonade album, Beyonce, was so monumental, and so well thought out." Recording artist Adele (Photo: Getty Images North America) Recording artists Jay Z (L) and Beyonce (Photo: Getty Images North America) Mean Girls - Cady breaks up her crown - just like Adele Read More Adele confirms she's secretly MARRIED and slams estranged dad in epic Grammy Awards speech 
"And so beautiful and soul bearing and we all got to see another side of you that you don't always let us see, and we appreciate that." 
"All of us artists f**king adore you," she went on. "You are our light. And the way that you make me and my friends feel, the way you make my black friends feel is empowering, and you make them stand up for themselves. 
"And I love you. I always have. And I always will." 
She then broke the award in half, to give a piece to Queen Bey - which made Twitter explode. 
A fan wrote: "Adele broke her Grammy for Beyoncé someone is a "Mean Girls" fan." Another added: "Adele Broke her Grammy and gave the other half to Beyonce! Legit straight out of Mean Girls!" Read More
